question: Which of the following clearly defines ‘TRYSEM’?
option1: A new system of semester examinations in universities
option2: Training the rural youth for self-employment
option3: A training programme for students in educational psychology
option4: A training course for farmers in dry land farming
answer: Training the rural youth for self-employment
explanation: Training of Rural Youth for Self-Employment or TRYSEM is the scheme aimed at providing basic technical and entrepreneurial skill to the rural poor in the age group of 18-35 years enable them take up income generating activities.
